duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage the overall operations of the veterinary hospital, including staff management and planning.
Develop and implement hospital policy, compliance, and quality checks.
Participate in client service resolution and drive strategic client communication and marketing efforts.
Manage accounts receivable, cash on hand, and hospital inventory, ensuring cost control.
Ensure payroll accuracy, perform invoice audit reviews, and manage facility and administrative costs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business or related degree is preferred. 3-5 years of experience in a manager role, including customer service experience. Experience in a hospital setting in positions of increased responsibility is a plus.
